sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_fsm_mobile.FSMMobileUsageUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Util class to collect mobile usage</description>
        <name>FSMMobileUsageUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMMobileUsageUtil = Class.create();
FSMMobileUsageUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.CATEGORY = FSMMobileUsageConstants.CATEGORY;
		this.COLLECTION_POINT_OFFLINE = FSMMobileUsageConstants.COLLECTION_POINT_OFFLINE;
		this.COLLECTION_POINT_ONLINE = FSMMobileUsageConstants.COLLECTION_POINT_ONLINE;

		this.BUCKET_FLOW_NAME = FSMMobileUsageConstants.BUCKET_FLOW_NAME;
    },

	recordEvent: function(offline, offlinEvent, offLineFlowName, onlineEvent, onlineFlowName) {
		(offline === true) ? this.recordOfflineEvent(offlinEvent, offLineFlowName) : this.recordOnlineEvent(onlineEvent, onlineFlowName); 
	},

	recordOfflineEvent: function(event, flowName) {
		var buckets = new GCFSampleMap();
		buckets.put(this.BUCKET_FLOW_NAME, flowName);
		
		this.recordUsage(this.CATEGORY, this.COLLECTION_POINT_OFFLINE, event, buckets);
	},

	recordOnlineEvent: function(event, flowName) {
		var buckets = new GCFSampleMap();
		buckets.put(this.BUCKET_FLOW_NAME, flowName);
		
		this.recordUsage(this.CATEGORY, this.COLLECTION_POINT_ONLINE, event, buckets);
	},

	recordUsage: function(category, collectionPoint, collectionEvent, buckets) {
		GCFCollector.recordUsageEvent(category, collectionPoint, collectionEvent, buckets);
	},

    type: 'FSMMobileUsageUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-08-24 23:57:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0da047a2c7b47110c636edf4c1c260e0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FSMMobileUsageUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Service Mobile" source="sn_fsm_mobile">5d66b0fbe770230003cd6188d2f6a976</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Field Service Mobile">5d66b0fbe770230003cd6188d2f6a976</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0da047a2c7b47110c636edf4c1c260e0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-06 23:03:48</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
